parameters.content:
🏨 HOTEL GUEST COMMUNICATION AUTOMATION
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
✨ Complete guest journey automation from booking to post-stay
📧 Pre-arrival welcome emails (1-2 days before check-in)
⭐ Post-stay review requests (24 hours after checkout)  
📊 Daily staff reports for arrivals/departures (6 AM daily)
🔄 Automatic tracking to prevent duplicate communications

🎯 PERFECT FOR: Hotels | B&Bs | Short-term rentals | Guest experience enhancement
💡 REDUCES: Manual work | Front desk inquiries | Missed follow-ups
🚀 INCREASES: Guest satisfaction | Online reviews | Operational efficiency

## Who's it for
Hotel managers, property managers, and hospitality businesses wanting to automate guest communications and improve operational efficiency.

## How it works
The workflow monitors a Google Sheets reservation database and automatically sends personalized emails at optimal times during the guest journey, while generating daily operational reports for staff.

## How to set up
1. Replace the Google Sheets ID with your reservation spreadsheet
2. Update hotel name and contact information in the "Edit Fields" nodes
3. Configure your Gmail credentials for sending emails
4. Customize email templates with your branding
5. Set staff email addresses for daily reports

## Requirements
- Google Sheets with reservation data
- Gmail account for sending emails
- n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)

## How to customize
- Modify email templates in Gmail nodes
- Adjust timing in Schedule Trigger nodes
- Add more data fields in Google Sheets integration
- Customize report format in "Create Email HTML" node
